title: [求助] 寻求 CatServer3.0 可用的插件以及报错问题
author: 神奈川归尘
txt_content:
目前本服需要一款市场插件使用站内的GlobalShop和GlobalMarket均无效
GlobalShop报错内容

[09:14:21] [Server thread/INFO] [net.minecraft.network.NetHandlerPlayServer]: GongShadow issued server command: /gs sell Vault 500
[09:14:21] [Server thread/ERROR] [net.minecraft.network.NetHandlerPlayServer]: null
org.bukkit.command.CommandException: Unhandled exception executing command 'gs' in plugin GlobalShop vv1.1.7.3
        at org.bukkit.command.PluginCommand.execute(PluginCommand.java:46) ~[PluginCommand.class:git-CatServer-1.12.2-c719bd5]

        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:841) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:472) [nz.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:778) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:632) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_65]
Caused by: java.lang.LinkageError: loader constraint violation: when resolving method "com.github.a810587921.GlobalShop.API.Event.ItemSellEvent.<init>(Lorg/bukkit/entity/Player;Lorg/bukkit/inventory/ItemStack;Lcom/github/a810587921/GlobalShop/API/MoneyAPI;)V" the class loader (instance of org/bukkit/plugin/java/PluginClassLoader) of the current class, com/github/a810587921/GlobalShop/IIIIIIiiII, and the class loader (instance of org/bukkit/plugin/java/PluginClassLoader) for the method's defining class, com/github/a810587921/GlobalShop/API/Event/ItemSellEvent, have different Class objects for the type com/github/a810587921/GlobalShop/API/MoneyAPI used in the signature
        at com.github.a810587921.GlobalShop.IIIIIIiiII.IiiiIiIiIi(Util.java:100) ~[?:?]
        at com.github.a810587921.GlobalShop.IiiIIIiIII.IiiiIiIiIi(Sell.java:141) ~[?:?]

        at org.bukkit.command.PluginCommand.execute(PluginCommand.java:44) ~[PluginCommand.class:git-CatServer-1.12.2-c719bd5]

这是PlayerPoints的报错内容
[08:56:11] [Server thread/INFO] [net.minecraft.network.NetHandlerPlayServer]: GongShadow issued server command: /points look xinchen
[08:56:11] [Server thread/ERROR] [net.minecraft.network.NetHandlerPlayServer]: null
org.bukkit.command.CommandException: Unhandled exception executing command 'points' in plugin PlayerPoints v2.1.3
        at org.bukkit.command.PluginCommand.execute(PluginCommand.java:46) ~[PluginCommand.class:git-CatServer-1.12.2-c719bd5]

playerpoints只能使用 /points me 其他命令均无法使用

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content: 也许是不兼容，建议使用catserver兼容的插件

replies.author: Coloured_glaze
replies.txt_content:
是无法使用gs的
请反馈某林
